casebody.data:
In the Matter of W.R. No. 560P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 26, 2006. Michelle F. Lynch, for Juvenile.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 634 S.E.2d 923.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of October 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

*545"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of October 2006."
